alert.note: Alert for Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 27 at 7:59PM CDT until August 31 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Madison and Rankin Counties. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 308.2 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday evening and continue falling to 300.2 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 303.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Pearl River Ratliff`s Ferr 303.0 308.2 Sat 7 pm CDT 306.7 304.6 303.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 900 AM CDT.
